overview: It's a new semester and it's time for rush! Anti-hazing? Fuck that! These girls are put to the test as they get jack-hammered vigorously into submission. Mike Adriano lays down the law as he cracks the 8-ball with Lacie Heart and Nadia Styles. And afterwards, he gives Harmony and Tiffany Taylor a tough lesson in cruel and unusual fucking. So don't miss out on the action, because the only way to get in this sorority is the hard way.
title: American Sorority Sluts
